txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Needed: Coarse skin from the beasts and toads within Meluinen. Deliver the items to Thaliollang at Lin Giliath.
'Thank you for this, it will make for interesting study.'
'The toads and beasts here, I believe, are also affected by the blight, but I need to study their skin to know what it has done to them.'
Elves of Rivendell Task: Coarse Skin
Thaliollang in the Elf-ruin of Meluinen at Lin Giliath requires the return of coarse skin.
Deliver the coarse skin to Thaliollang at Lin Giliath
You are on a task to collect coarse skin from the beasts and toads found in Meluinen and to deliver them to Thaliollang. Thaliollang can be found at Lin Giliath, the Elf-ruins of Meluinen.
Needed: Coarse skin from the beasts and toads within Meluinen.
